content.rendered:
beauty bar in markham | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar on yonge + lawrence, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in markham | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 106 main street north markham, ontario
  • 905-554-7768
  • markham@thetenspot.com
  • licensed to serve alcohol

Hours

mon. - wed: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

thu. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Started coming here for waxing a couple of months ago and could not be happier with the services. From the moment I walk in till I leave I am left impressed. Really appreciate all of the staff here and this great facility!
Julia Alvea
1720031643
Diana is the tech you want. She is the best at everything! She is precise, friendly, and a perfectionist. I am now her forever client. Thank you!
Not on file
1716332609
Very friendly environment. All the workers are kind and sociable. All the rooms have a TV with Netflix for comfort. Rooms are very clean as well. Only been here for waxing but they also do nail care!
Tylah Wraxall
1713907627
I had a Brazilian wax for the first time at the Ten Spot and it was such a great experience! The space was clean, and the front desk staff were friendly and courteous. I am currently 30 weeks pregnancy and Diana made the experience really... comfortable and as painless as possible. I’ll definitely be returning!read more
Alicia Ng
1712091989
I've done my fair share of waxes by so many different ways and people. I think I found my go to. All those wasted trips downtown (if you know, you know) when a really good place was around the corner.I'll be returning for sure, they have... memberships you should consider!read more
Jaymee D.C
1710538392
Such an amazing pedicure! Relaxing, friendly, and efficient service (i got the quickie pedi). Super pleased--I went in with "winter heels" and came out feeling smooth and ready for spring. Ariana did a great job shaping my nails. Would for sure book... again!read more
Jen Lewis
1707506924
I visited this location because I was in the area and the staff are very welcoming and polite! Very impressed with the service and treatment I received here especially from Diana! She was amazing at ensuring I was comfortable throughout the whole... appointment and did an amazing job considering I am very much pregnant! I will definitely be going back, thank you!read more
Lisa S
1706488996
‹
›
